meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a puppy.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy toy had a puppylike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter filled the room, creating a puppylike atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The puppylike behavior of the kitten chasing its tail was adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was puppylike, bouncing around the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The puppylike enthusiasm of the young dog was infectious.

meanings.definition: Playful and energetic, like a puppy.
meanings.sent1: The puppylike kitten pounced on the toy with glee.
meanings.sent2: The puppylike behavior of the children running around the park was delightful.
meanings.sent3: The puppylike antics of the squirrel trying to climb the tree were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her puppylike enthusiasm for the game was unmatched by anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The puppylike energy of the puppy never seemed to wane.
